phrs.translation: 防疫；疫病防治；流行病预防
损失预防；预防损失的措施

sentences.sentence: Crime prevention had to be given more prominence.
sentences.translation: 犯罪预防得给予更多重视。

sentences.sentence: Calcium may aid in the prevention of colon cancer.
sentences.translation: 钙可能有助于预防结肠癌。

sentences.sentence: Stores spend more and more on crime prevention every year.
sentences.translation: 商店每年在防止犯罪方面的花费越来越多。
